card.name: Exalted Seed
card.text:
{Shroud} {Summon} Place counters on this card equal to the amount of materials attached to it. {Upkeep} Remove 1 counter from this card: double its strength and toughness.
It begins in deep space warped by dark power.

card.name: Master of Lords
card.text:
{Summon} Target one enemy Quanta Lord: remove its effect as long as this card is on the field, then give this card one ability.
A middling creature, easily smited by its superiors, and yet...

card.name: Reawakening
card.text:
Target unit loses its existing effect/s, then gains its original effect/s (if any).
"I rose from a puddle of pitch-black tar; my spirit was broken, my body contorted. I asked not how, but why."

card.name: Tiny Sickle
card.text:
If you summon this card by evolving, it gains [Toxic] and [Swift]. {Evolve} Gain +2/0
There is no lasting hierarchy among the Verol; there is only the moment's duty. Even the lowest of the low won't hesitate.

card.name: Seventh Son
card.text:
{Summon} Attach two cards from your graveyard as material. {Evolve} {Summon} You can detach (any instances of) Seventh Son from this card and place it into your deck.
The flow of many bloodlines converged in one locus...t.

card.name: Offshoot
card.text:
Create a token copy of a friendly material.
The species will likely cease to exist within the decade. It preserveres nonetheless.

card.name: Zao, the Weaver
card.text:
Has [Shroud] while you have other friendly units. Your units gain the effect... "{Summon} Give another friendly unit +2/0 or 0/+2."
The guiding hand of the third colony, which has long cut ties with the mainland.

card.name: Oozing Captain
card.text:
{Summon} Remove an ability from all enemy units that have one; for each removed ability, give a friendly unit [Toxic].
Sailed to the Searing Seas to find new life for himself. Found new life in himself.
